Avaunt Indifference!  with thy heedless air,</br>And Levity!  who tip-toe stands behind;</br>For this rough waste of all but rank weeds bare,</br>Speaks other language to a pensive mind.

For in these bounds those crosier'd walls beneath,</br>O'er which yon elms their spreading branches wave,</br>Six times ten thousand bore the train of death,</br>Stamp'd in a moment for the noisome grave.
Some that, perhaps, when Edward led the way</br>In Norman fields could deathful deeds provoke;</br>Their faulchions flashing like a comet's ray,</br>While woods of spears descended at their stroke.
Promiscuous here lay mingled with the rest,</br>That fated fell in plague's relentless hour;</br>No dirge funereal their worth confess'd,</br>No sculptur'd stone preserves their boast of pow'r:
But here convey'd by mutes in mournful guise,</br>Whose wants had soften'd Horror to a trade,</br>No crouds as erst pursu'd with curious eyes,</br>Nor tribute, but astonishment was paid!
And yet how fair the wonted morn arose,</br>That with destruction charg'd the welcome light;</br>Ah!  who can tell what may a day disclose,</br>The noon of life may feel the damps of night.
Delusive day!  what projects then were crush'd,</br>What hopeful schemes that furnish'd years of care!</br>Perhaps in sad concern alike were hush'd,</br>Two restless rivals, and some hapless fair!
Ill suit my numbers fully to express</br>The panic wild discovery must feel,</br>When the first victim prov'd the dire distress,</br>That courtly prudence labour'd to conceal.
For wing'd the tale all guilt-attractive flies,</br>The city's dark recesses to alarm:</br>No golden god could charm Avaro's eyes,</br>But dropt instinctive to his nerveless arm.
Nor could the Court th' unyielding fact evade,</br>To supple arts and compliments unknown;</br>Can Truth e'en by such sycophants be staid,</br>That urg'd Canute to raise his wave-wash'd throne?
No; spite of State they flew, and equal fears</br>With hinds of sad mortality betray;</br>Ah!  ill starr'd crouds, no flight for you appears,</br>Another death in arms impedes your way!

From scenes like these all but despair must turn</br>As spiry grass the once throng'd paths o'erspread,</br>While Thames slow languish'd in his silent urn,</br>The wings of commerce drooping o'er his head.
Habitual Mis'ry but the bosom steels,</br>Scarce kindred then a kindred sigh could claim;</br>E'en sympathy, unsocial grown, conceals</br>Her soothing softness, and her chearing flame.
For, callous, see!  among that motly croud,</br>A plund'rer's arm stretch'd o'er that dying bed,</br>To ill-got wealth enjoyment's not allow'd—</br>For lo!  a shaft has at the miscreant fled.

Vain was his thought, the deep embowl'd earth</br>Might save his treasures till had ceas'd the storm;</br>And these descry'd oft brings such crimes to birth,</br>Swells the wife's tale, or gives a spectre form!
But tho' from taste we dread such ills no more,</br>Our domes from science drink the healthful breeze;</br>Unwatch'd as erst from sad Byzantium's shore,</br>Each pore might open to the fell disease!
Yet this remains; that tho' with mortal sweep,</br>Fierce Nemesis again should seek her prey;</br>He's more than safe, that Virtue's lore can keep</br>With heart benignant as the beams of day.</br>
